description: @TheDrDerek In this video, I discuss a topic I don't usually cover‚Äîpolitics and voting as a Christian. I share what I take to be some key principles on how to have an informed Christian conscience at the polls, based on my own experiences, lessons from my classroom, and insights from Christian teaching. I talk about things like political idolatry, the importance of your Christian identity, whether your vote really makes a difference, voting rights versus duties, and single-issue voting on topics like abortion.

title: The Great Schism: A Turning Point in Church Unity #philosophy #Christianity #Catholic #faith #seek
description: @TheDrDerek I dive into the Great Schism of 1054 AD, the event that split Catholicism from the Eastern Orthodox Church. I also touch on how early Church Fathers were undeniably Catholic and how Protestant views integrate with early ecumenical councils. Plus, I raise the question of why some councils are accepted while others, like those post-Vatican II, aren't.

title: The Core Beliefs That Unite All Christians #philosophy #Christianity #Catholicism #Catholic #faith
description: @TheDrDerek I'm diving into the central beliefs that unite all Christians, no matter their denomination. Inspired by C.S. Lewis's 'Mere Christianity', I'll talk about key doctrines like the Trinity, the dual nature of Christ, and why these core beliefs have held strong since the early ecumenical councils. Join me as I explore why these specific councils continue to matter today.

title: What is Vainglory?? #vainglory #pride #deadlysins  #philosophy
description: @TheDrDerek Let's dive into the Latin roots of "vana gloria" and break down what the term really means!

title: The True Meaning of Glory (& Vainglory) #vainglory #pride #deadlysins  #philosophy
description: @TheDrDerek You know when someone wins at the Olympics and earns respect and recognition for their hard work? That's true glory. But there's also this thing called vainglory...

title: The Odd Man Out in the Seven Deadly Sins #vainglory #pride #deadlysins #philosophy
description: @TheDrDerek  Which one is the odd man out? Spoiler: it's pride, not vainglory! I explain why vainglory often gets left off modern lists and how this goes all the way back to Dante's Divine Comedy.

title: Destroying the Number Three?! #math #metaphysics #philosophy #numbers #abstract #objects #naturalism
description: @TheDrDerek  What would happen if the number three were a physical object. Spoiler alert: it would throw all of mathematics into chaos!

title: Isaac Newton knew Philosophy? #principia #physics #philosophy #education #secret
description: @TheDrDerek  Did you know? Isaac Newton wasn't just a physicist! His groundbreaking work didn't even mention physics in the title! Check out why Newton considered himself more of a philosopher than a physicist and how it changes our view of his legacy.

title: Breaking Stereotypes: The Truth About Philosophers   #stereotypes #philosophy #education #secret
description: @TheDrDerek  I'm tackling some common stereotypes about philosophers that aren't always true. Did you know that not all philosophers are old, dead white guys with beards?

title: The Surprising World of Philosophy Degrees in Hollywood  #celebrity #philosophy #education #secret
description: @TheDrDerek  Martin Luther King Jr., Alex Trebek, Phil Jackson, Ricky Gervais, Matt Groening, Stephen Colbert, Steve Martin, and Harrison Ford. You might know more people than you realize have a philosophy degree.

title: 7 or 8 Deadly Sins? - Pride & Vainglory: What's the Difference?
description: People often confuse & conflate these two Deadly Sins‚Äìeven Dante in his Inferno!‚Äìbut pride and vainglory are distinct from one another.

title: What is Philosophy? A breakdown of the discipline!
description: Here you can find a Taxonomy, or classificatory system, of the discipline of Philosophy, along with my commentary on several of the sub-fields, what sorts of questions they ask and issues they cover.
